Text:
thank you soooo much for this
Sandra is one of my favourite singers & truly kicks arse
not many male singers can match her
like Annie Haslam (Renaissance) Tarja (Nightwish) Amy Lee (Evanscence) she possesses true vision in sound & octave ranges that are purely scary
I would buy the original of this album but nothing of Sandra's music including Guano Apes has ever been released in Kiwiana
cheers Gazza
